release.name: Theme.Current Nil Fix
release.notes: Fixed Theme.Current nil error in SaveConfiguration by making Theme globally accessible

changes: ğŸ› CRITICAL FIX - Theme.Current Nil Error
âœ… FIXED: 'attempt to index nil with Current' at line 96
Root cause: Theme was local to CreateWindow, not accessible in SaveConfiguration
Solution: Made Theme globally accessible via RvrseUI.Theme (line 520)
Added nil check: if RvrseUI.Theme and RvrseUI.Theme.Current (lines 96-98)
SaveConfiguration now accesses RvrseUI.Theme.Current safely
âœ… Config saving now works flawlessly with theme persistence
âœ¨ MAJOR FEATURE - Theme Persistence in Config

ğŸ¯ Debounced saves (max once per second)
âœ¨ MAJOR FEATURE - Controller Chip Boundary Clamping
ğŸ® Controller chip can no longer go off-screen
ğŸ® Position clamped to viewport boundaries

ğŸ® Boundaries: X [0, screenWidth-50], Y [0, screenHeight-50]
ğŸ® Works on any screen size/resolution
ğŸ“ TECHNICAL DETAILS
SaveConfiguration: Saves Theme.Current as _RvrseUI_Theme (line 96)
LoadConfiguration: Reads _RvrseUI_Theme, stores in _savedTheme (lines 158-164)
CreateWindow: Applies _savedTheme before window creation (lines 945-947)

Drag handler: Clamps newX/newY to screen bounds (lines 1758-1759)
